...
#wedscoop","date_published":"2025-06-22T13:14:11.000Z","id":"0062677762838239cedb76315b7e0940","image":"https://scontent-sjc6-1.cdninstagram.com/v/t51.2885-15/511393920_18326135590200697_9056888537486380420_n.webp?stp=dst-jpg_e35_s1080x1080_sh0.08_tt6&_nc_ht=scontent-sjc6-1.cdninstagram.com&_nc_cat=101&_nc_oc=Q6cZ2QGCEaaNpGgBK63GveuFYj-a8REq71TLqRcMsWtiqhTkoQIGa3RbsJhdPrFOYcLlUXA&_nc_ohc=TWAjWU9vvc0Q7kNvwGUHGYF&_nc_gid=bQz9q_qDdWXx6b5SEsp_hQ&edm=APs17CUBAAAA&ccb=7-5&oh=00_AfaEBMxtzqk3-4DdcVnc8_FE7zBsl3zPXeVi9KGXkhHHTQ&oe=68C3D86C&_nc_sid=10d13b","title":""Love, laughter and lifelong friendships" . @ashnamonga ... #wedscoop","url":"https://www.instagram.com/p/DLNFCf0Tv_j"}],"language":"en","title":"Wedscoop by Saurabh Kalra (@wedscoop)","version":"https://jsonfeed.org/version/1.1"},"portfolio":{"bridal-shots":["/images/portfolio/bridall.jpg","/images/portfolio/bridal2.jpg","/images/portfolio/bridal3.webp","/images/portfolio/bridal4.webp","/images/portfolio/bridal5.webp","/images/portfolio/bridal6.webp","/images/portfolio/bridal7.webp","/images/portfolio/bridal8.webp","/images/portfolio/bridal9.webp","/images/portfolio/bridal10.webp"],"ceremony-shots":["/images/portfolio/ceremony1.jpg","/images/portfolio/ceremony2.jpg"],"couple-shots":["/images/portfolio/ceremony1.jpg","/images/portfolio/ceremony2.jpg"]},"reviews":{"reviews":[{"comment":"I am so glad for choosing Wedscoop for all my wedding events! The entire team was professional, creative, and truly passionate about their work. They beautifully captured every emotion and detail, making our special day even more memorable. The photos and videos turned out beyond our expectations, will cherish them forever. Highly recommended to anyone looking for a team that turns moments into timeless memories!","date":"2025-08-20","name":"Shivang Ahuja","rating":5},{"comment":"","date":"2025-06-17","name":"Arun Aggarwal","rating":5},{"comment":"Saurabh and his team have done an incredible job capturing our wedding celebrations. The team have been very accommodating, professional and responsive to feedback. Our videos and photos are breathtaking and have been loved by us, family and friends. The team comes highly recommended from us üëå","date":"2025-04-05","name":"Rach & Anant Sinha","rating":5},{"comment":"Saurabh and his team were the best, they captured each and every moment of our wedding so beautifully. They made our experience so much more fun and memorable, and the picture and the video quality was spectacular. Couldn‚Äôt have asked for better photo and video shoot for our wedding!","date":"2025-03-15","name":"Srishti Kumar","rating":5},{"comment":"Saurabh and team were superb! They captured the essence of our wedding exactly as we wanted and every-time I see the videos created by them feels like a dream. Saurabh is really accommodating and is definitely an amazing photographer. We surely chose the best ‚ù§Ô∏è thanks Saurabh and team!","date":"2024-09-24","name":"muskaan laroia","rating":5},{"comment":"We had Wedscoop cover our events for our wedding and they were super professional, easy to work with and we're so delighted that we picked them to cover our special day. We're so pleased with the pictures and videos! Highly recommend!!!","date":"2024-08-05","name":"Nakul Arora","rating":5},{"comment":"Saurabh and his team are a very professional and accommodative bunch. We have had a smooth ride with them being on time even if we weren't. The video has been praised by our family and friends and we have happily recommended them to anyone who has asked us. You can select them with no doubts!","date":"2024-07-21","name":"Aditi Sharma","rating":5},{"comment":"Saurabh and his team did a fantastic job. They were very accommodating and delivered all products on time, as promised. Our wedding video and pictures turned out excellent. They provided top-quality work and nothing less. I highly recommend their services.","date":"2024-07-14","name":"khyatee kalra","rating":5},{"comment":"Wedscoop has grandly immortalized our wedding celebrations. Every emotion has been gracefully and elegantly placed. The energy of our wedding festival has been exhibited with the same pomp and splendor as it felt for all of us. Team is highly professional, unobtrusive on the field and has delivered the content right on time. Absolutely way more value for your money. Every second of the videos, and every candid capture brings back the excitement from the wedding and a nostalgic smile. Thank you team! You will go a long way!!!!","date":"2023-02-01","name":"Shrey Choudhary","rating":5},{"comment":"I booked Wedscoop for both of my Sister-in-laws wedding functions and the whole family was just delighted both the times with the quality of the work and their professionalism. They took a detailed brief and delivered exactly what we wanted and made sure they took the photos we wanted them to.","date":"2022-11-24","name":"parul kapur","rating":5},{"comment":"The Wedscoop team was extremely professional and at the same time very friendly. The one vendor in my entire wedding that everyone enquired about was the photographers; aka Wedscoop. In such a heavily packed wedding schedule, Saurabh made sure that all the beautiful moments are captured without me batting an eyelid for it. I would recommend them 100% to any potential enquiries.","date":"2022-08-19","name":"Vaidehi Gaur","rating":5},{"comment":"First of all, I don‚Äôt think the team needs any feedback, their work speaks for itself. Considering the times now, the photography for our wedding day was the most important aspect for me and my partner and we spent a lot of time looking for someone who had the same ideas as us. We‚Äôre so glad that we went ahead with Wedscoop. They captured all those precious moments from start to finish. The work is incredible and Saurabh's professionalism makes him worth every penny he cost. You won‚Äôt find a better wedding photographer!","date":"2021-05-04","name":"Aakanksha Bhatia","rating":5},{"comment":"We saw the work of Wedscoop on Instagram and reached out to Saurabh and in less than 3-4 hours the mandate relating to photography and videography for our wedding and related functions was given to Wedscoop. This is because not only is there work splendid but speaking to Saurabh was comforting that the Wedscoop folks know there craft, are courteous and will not try to pull a smart one. All through our discussions I got the feeling that they were concentrated and focussed on how to get the best photography and videography for our functions and not hung up just on the fee or unwarranted payment structures. At the functions too, my parents really loved the minimalistic interference these guys would have unlike the overbearing behaviour some photographers and there teams tend to have. Basically a lot of there photography becomes candid - these folks tend to let there actions speak rather than all words and no action. I cannot say enough about there professionalism, being at the top of there behaviour and more than anything letting people enjoy the functions and without becoming an impediment to natural feelings and emotions, preserving memories through splendid photos and videos. To sum it up, more than thee fees, it is the excitement and happiness of there client in seeing the photos and videos which drives Saurabh and Wedscoop and therefore by the end of it you end up with more than just a photography and videography team. Thank you very much again folks, it was a pleasure and see you soon for rest of the functions in my life ahead.","date":"2021-11-17","name":"Kanwardeep Singh","rating":5},{"comment":"Wedscoop team was our choice for our wedding shoot personally because of the choice of songs I had witnessed in their previous work related videos I saw online. They did absolute justice to the pictures and videos shot during my wedding. As candid as possible, followed every bit of instruction very closely and the best team we could‚Äôve hired for ourselves. WEDSCOOP and entire Saurabh‚Äôs team is definitely the one stop destination for all you people searching for quality work. Regards, Ishita and Achin #TEAMAI","date":"2021-11-14","name":"ishita rawal","rating":5},{"comment":"","date":"2021-11-10","name":"Hargun Makkar","rating":5},{"comment":"I am so glad that we stumbled across Wedscoop‚Äôs Photography. I can‚Äôt say enough about how professional the team is and the quality of work that they provide. Having an attention to detail, they manage to get fantastic shots capturing both the fun moments and the heartwarming ones which one can cherish forever through life. What makes them outstanding is their patience, energy, and friendliness during the whole process. The team really makes you comfortable on the day when you are most filled with emotions. Once anyone books Saurabh and his team, they can completely rely on them to provide a delightful experience. Our sincere thanks for these beautiful photos and videos. The team was incredible on the day and we couldn‚Äôt have asked for a better photographer.","date":"2021-10-10","name":"Richa Sawhney","rating":5},{"comment":"It was an awesome experience having wedscoop covered my wedding functions. Thorough professional and awesome crew.","date":"2021-10-02","name":"Ankit kumar","rating":5},{"comment":"Loved Wedscoop team. First of all, their punctuality is something to be appreciated. Secondly, they produce shots and videos just the way you wish. Most importantly, they give you result till you get satisfied. Highly cooperative when it comes to delivering the desired results. In my case, I took months to do my part of selecting photos for album but Saurabh always delivers on time.","date":"2021-09-30","name":"Yamini Agarwal","rating":5},{"comment":"","date":"2021-09-29","name":"Aakriti Kaul","rating":5},{"comment":"","date":"2021-09-28","name":"charu gautam","rating":5}]},"weddingfilms":{"weddingfilms":[{"title":"Mansi & Arun Wedding Film","videoId":"qOk-GwsXQP4"},{"title":"Pracheta & Samyak Wedding Film","videoId":"tcjv6xCpyR4"},{"title":"Madhuri & Govind Wedding Film","videoId":"k4z1MpwLcyg"},{"title":"Vaishali & Kunal Wedding Film","videoId":"USQKhvxDJdg"},{"title":"Ashna & Shivang Wedding Film","videoId":"esH4IBxsYKo"},{"title":"Sukhmani & Saharsh Film","videoId":"AKPDAO4W4kg"},{"title":"Khyatee & Devansh Wedding Film","videoId":"YkDgvV-AuiQ"},{"title":"Aditi & Saurabh Wedding Film","videoId":"oEnXPLT6Um4"},{"title":"Aakriti & Shrey Wedding Film","videoId":"A3uBsXdHHro"},{"title":"Lalima & Sarthak Wedding Film","videoId":"wZYA9Tf8f-s"},{"title":"Vaidehi & Vijit Wedding Film","videoId":"Nk1Qw36Z3Kk"}]}}
